column4: I have this netbook (MSI GE-620) with a software-based EJECT button. It doesn't work when using Ubuntu. Is there a way to eject my DVDROM when there is no disc inside?
It doesn't have a button on the outside of the DVD drive?
No, it doesn't, the EJECT key is in the middle of the Keyboard
Then use the command sudo eject /dev/sr0 in your terminal window.
